page.title: 07**** PIGEON RACING ****
page.content: Pigeons have 3 kinds of food to eat.They only need to be fed once in the winter and twice in the summer every day.In the{pigeon season}which lasts from{May to September,}they are trained 2 or 3 times a day.There is a race at least every week in the pigeon season,so if you come 1st 2nd 3rd or 4th you win some points.You also need to set a clock. To set a clock you just push a key down and turn it.Every year when pigeons are born they have a ring put on their foot,so if they get lost anyone who finds them can locate their loft.My father is in the {Easington Lane Homing Society. Whoever has the most points at the end of the year will receive a trophy and certificate.
